text.sentence: I am afraid I will not be able to make it to the baby shower this Saturday.
However, I would love to buy Daniela a gift for her new baby girl.
I had a look at the Target Registry. Unfortunately, I couldn't seem to find anything that I would personally like to buy for Daniela.
So I ordered something else from Amazon instead.
I hope the baby will like it.
I had the gift shipped to your address that you wrote in your email.
The estimated delivery date is between Nov 30 and Dec 5, and I hope you will receive it in time for the baby shower.
Say congratulations to Daniela for me!
Do they have a name for the baby girl yet?
